author: Paul Moakley
title: On Easter, One New York City Church Mourns the Loss of Its Leader as Its Priests Recover From COVID-19
description: Fr. Brendan Gormley talks to TIME about how the pandemic has upended his church during the holiest week of the year for Christians.
content: Fr. Brendan Gormley is a 56-year-old priest who joined The Church of St. Clare, the largest Roman Catholic parish in Staten Island, N.Y., three years ago. He is now recovering from COVID-19, the disease caused by the novel coronavirus, along with four of his … [+5187 chars]
